channel.title: I want the quest interface to pop up when you click on a quest
channel.description:
I made a custom quest called Corporal Punishment and when you click it I want it to take you sto the quest guide I made, how do I do that.
And this is where I wrote it.... [code]sendQuest("Corporal Punishment", 12772);[/code]

item.title: I want the quest interface to pop up when you click on a quest
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Well, you basically failed to ask the question because you haven’t supplied us any code or past attempts. It would be something like this…

case ####: yourmethod(); break;

Read full topic
